Virtual Office

Offer Secretary service mail handling,call answering, fax and a range of options ti accommodate your need

WHAT IS VIRTUAL OFFICE SERVICE?

Hyrux'S Virtual Office Service offers you the benefits of traditional office with a fraction of its cost. Our services including Registration Address for your business in Hong Kong, Mails and Parcels handing, dedicated Phone Number and Fax Number. Besides, professional Phone secretary will answer phone calls in behalf of your company.

It is an optimized solution that builds a professional first impression for your business in Hong Kong, and helps you run daily administrative routines at the mean time in a cost-effective manner.
